lines.gurmukhi: ACl ACyd pRBu jw kY bs ibs√ç bl qY ju rs bs kIey kvn pRkwr kY
lines.transliteration_english: Achhal Achhayd Prabhu Jaa Kai Bas Bisv Bala , Tai Ju Ras Bas Keeay Kavan Prakaar Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O friend! that Transcendent one who cannot be deceived by anyone. He is unbreakable who with His power has subdued the whole world, With what elixir have you been able to enamor Him?

lines.gurmukhi: isv snkwid bHmwidk n DRXwn pwvY qyro DRXwn DwrY AwlI kvn isMgwr kY
lines.transliteration_english: Siv Sanakaadi Brahamaadik N Dhyaan Paavai , Tayro Dhyaan Dhaarai Aalee Kavan Singaar Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O friend! He who has not even been realised by Sanak, Sananadan and those who have contemplated on Brahma, what embellishments and adornments have attracted Him to you?

lines.gurmukhi: ingm AsMK syK jMpq hY jw ko jsu qyro js gwvq kvn aupkwr kY
lines.transliteration_english: Nigam Asankh Saykh Janpat Hai Jaa Ko Jasu , Tayro Jas Gaavat Kavan Oupakaar Kai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: O friend! the Lord whose praise is being said in different words by Vedas and Sheshnag, what merits have made Him sing your praise?

lines.gurmukhi: sur nr nwQ jwih Kojq n Koj pwvY Kojq iPrh qoih kvn ipAwr kY ]647]
lines.transliteration_english: Sur Nar Naad Jaahi Khojat N Khoj Paavai , Khojat Dhirah Tohi Kavan Piaar Kai ?647?

Shabad OS B.translation: God who has not been realised by gods, man and Naths who have laboured untiringly, what type of love has made Him search you?  (647)
